item.title: 夏威夷电力公司股价下跌，美国国会要求提供火灾调查的更多细节
item.description: 众议院共和党人要求夏威夷电力公司回答更多问题并提供更多文件，作为调查该公司在去年致命的拉海纳野火中扮演的角色的一部分。【原文：House Republicans asked Hawaiian Electric Co. to answer additional questions and provide more documents as part of their probe into the utility’s role in last year’s deadly Lahaina wildfire.】

item.title: 亚马逊就法国监察机构对员工监控行为的罚款提出上诉
item.description: 亚马逊公司正在对法国数据保护监督机构 CNIL 今年 1 月做出的一项决定提起上诉。该决定对亚马逊公司处以 3,200 万欧元（合 3,460 万美元）的罚款，原因是亚马逊公司建立了一个监控员工活动和表现的系统，而 CNIL 称该系统 "具有过分的侵入性"。【原文：Amazon.com Inc. is appealing a January decision by the French data protection watchdog CNIL, which fined the company €32 million ($34.6 million) for setting up a system to monitor employee activity and performance that it called “excessively intrusive.”】

item.title: 保健连锁店 Auna 3.6 亿美元首次公开募股未达预期，股价下跌 21
item.description: Auna SA 的股价周五下跌了 21%，这家专注于拉丁美洲的医疗保健服务提供商在美国首次公开发行股票，募集资金 3.6 亿美元，定价低于市场预期范围。【原文：Auna SA shares fell 21% on Friday after the Latin America-focused health-care services provider’s US initial public offering raised $360 million and priced below a marketed range.】

item.title: 波兰杂货价格战导致零售商股价下跌
item.description: 波兰食品杂货连锁店之间的针锋相对正在侵蚀它们的利润和股价。【原文：The tit-for-tat battle among Poland’s grocery chains is eroding their profits and share prices.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长斯奇鲁纳告诉 Econostream 四月可能降息
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员爱德华-斯奇鲁纳（Edward Scicluna）告诉 Econostream Media，欧洲中央银行最快可能在 4 月份降息，而且不应排除降息的可能性。【原文：A European Central Bank interest-rate cut as soon as April could be warranted and shouldn’t be ruled out, Governing Council member Edward Scicluna told Econostream Media.】

item.title: 纽蒙特加纳阿基姆金矿吸引中国兴趣
item.description: 据知情人士透露，纽蒙特公司（Newmont Corp.）已开始出售其位于加纳的阿基姆金矿，在金属价格飙升的背景下，该金矿吸引了包括中国生产商在内的潜在竞购者的兴趣。【原文：Newmont Corp. has kicked off the sale of its Akyem gold mine in Ghana, which is attracting interest from potential bidders including Chinese producers amid soaring prices for the metal, people with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: BMO 预测股市反弹的策略师正在为修正做准备
item.description: 作为华尔街少数几位正确预测了去年股市涨势的预测者之一，布莱恩-贝尔斯基发现自己又一次站在了相反的立场上。但这一次，布莱恩-贝尔斯基（Brian Belski）认为股市将大幅下挫，而他的许多同行则转而看涨。【原文：One of few Wall Street forecasters who correctly predicted last year’s stock market rally finds himself in a contrarian position once again. But this time Brian Belski thinks equities are set up for a substantial plunge — just as many of his peers are turning bullish.】

item.title: 特斯拉推动加拿大第一大港中国汽车进口量跃升
item.description: 在特斯拉公司开始从其位于上海的千兆工厂运输电动汽车之后，加拿大最繁忙的港口从中国运来的汽车数量超过了美国和墨西哥。【原文：Canada’s busiest port is seeing more autos arriving from China than the US and Mexico, after Tesla Inc. started shipping electric vehicles from its gigafactory in Shanghai.】

item.title: 梅洛尼官员认为意大利将打破黯淡预测，实现 1%的增长
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，意大利总理乔治亚-梅洛尼（Giorgia Meloni）的官员估计，意大利经济今年将打破低迷的预测，实现约1%的增长。【原文：Premier Giorgia Meloni’s officials reckon the Italian economy will defy downbeat forecasts this year with expansion of around 1%, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 华伦天奴创意总监皮乔利离开意大利品牌
item.description: 由卡塔尔 Mayhoola 公司控股的意大利时装品牌华伦天奴（Valentino）表示，其创意总监即将离职。【原文：Valentino, the Italian fashion house controlled by Qatar’s Mayhoola, said its creative director is leaving.】

item.title: 欧洲地区进入停电高峰期，欧洲石油再次走弱
item.description: 随着欧洲进入炼油厂检修高峰期，来自美国的石油大量涌入，欧洲的原油现货市场再次陷入低迷。【原文：The physical crude market in Europe is slumping afresh as the region heads into peak refinery maintenance season amid a flood of oil from the US.】

item.title: 加拿大政府支出增长速度是收入增长速度的两倍
item.description: 加拿大财政部长克里斯蒂娅-弗里兰（Chrystia Freeland）正准备在下个月公布预算，加拿大政府支出的增长速度超过了收入的增长速度，利息支出也在继续攀升。【原文：Canadian government spending is growing faster than revenue, and interest payments are continuing to climb, as Finance Minister Chrystia Freeland prepares to deliver her budget next month.】

item.title: ExodusPoint 在损失 7000 万美元后停止 Bhavit Sawjani 的交易
item.description: 对冲基金 ExodusPoint Capital Management 去年底停止了巴维特-索贾尼（Bhavit Sawjani）的交易，他是一名著名的雇员，也是迪拜的投资组合经理，领导着一个六人团队，去年亏损超过 7000 万美元。【原文：Hedge fund ExodusPoint Capital Management stopped Bhavit Sawjani, a marquee hire and Dubai-based portfolio manager who led a six-member team, from trading late last year following losses of more than $70 million.】

item.title: 挪威因补贴问题推迟浮动风电计划
item.description: 由于欧洲自由贸易联盟监督局就国家对潜在项目的支持提出质疑，挪威正在推迟其进军海上浮动风力发电厂的时间表。【原文：Norway is pushing back its timeline for a move into offshore floating wind parks as it deals with queries from the European Free Trade Association Surveillance Authority over state support for potential projects.】

item.title: 塞内加尔前总统瓦德的政党在三月投票中支持法耶
item.description: 塞内加尔前总统阿卜杜拉耶-瓦德（Abdoulaye Wade）领导的塞内加尔民主党（Senegalese Democratic Party）在 3 月 24 日总统大选前向反对党候选人巴西鲁-迪奥马耶-法耶（Bassirou Diomaye Faye）提供了支持，这可能会改变游戏规则。【原文：Senegal’s ex-President Abdoulaye Wade’s Senegalese Democratic Party in a potential game changer ahead of March 24 presidential elections, threw its support behind opposition candidate Bassirou Diomaye Faye.】

item.title: 埃尔-埃里安称 10 年期国债收益率 "合理"，曲线趋缓
item.description: 穆罕默德-埃尔-埃里安（Mohamed El-Erian）认为，2024 年 10 年期国债收益率约为 4.25% 是 "合理 "的平均水平，因为今年最大的赌注之一即将实现。【原文：A yield on 10-year Treasuries of around 4.25% is a “reasonable” average for 2024 as one of the year’s biggest bets comes to pass, according to Mohamed El-Erian.】

item.title: 与特朗普有关联的 SPAC 在报道股东批准交易后暴跌
item.description: 有报道称，数字世界收购公司（Digital World Acquisition Corp.）获得了足够的股东支持，将与前总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的社交媒体公司合并。【原文：Investors dumped shares of Digital World Acquisition Corp., the blank-check firm set to merge with former president Donald Trump’s social media company, after reports that it got enough shareholder support for the deal.】

item.title: 债券反弹中长期国债收益率触及一周低点
item.description: 周五，长期国债收益率跌至一周多以来的最低水平，这增加了受通胀放缓将允许美联储和其他央行在今年降息的预期推动的债券市场涨势。【原文：Yields on long-dated Treasuries fell to their lowest levels in more than a week Friday, adding to bond-market gains driven by expectations that slowing inflation will allow the Federal Reserve and other central banks to cut interest rates this year.】

item.title: 价值 21 亿美元的 Invesco 基金提供了投资水风险的途径
item.description:
该基金是美国发行的 11 支基金之一，吸引着投资者关注清洁水日益稀缺的世界。【原文：

The fund is one of 11 US offerings that are drawing investors to a world where clean water is becoming scarcer.

】

item.title: 鲍勃-米歇尔和穆罕默德-埃尔-埃里安感受到了华尔街的乐观情绪
item.description:
与 2000 年代中期的对比— 好的方面— 又开始流行起来

。【原文：

Comparisons to the mid-2000s — in a good way — are back in vogue

】

item.title: 巴西最大的单一家族办公室之一资产增至 110 亿美元
item.description: 管理巴西亿万富翁莫雷拉-萨雷斯家族财富的家族办公室将其管理的资产增加到近 110 亿美元，同时增加了员工。【原文：The family office managing the fortune of Brazil’s billionaire Moreira Salles clan boosted its assets under management to nearly $11 billion while adding staff.】

item.title: 比尔-格罗斯抱怨 "过度繁荣"，股票创下历史新高
item.description: 比尔-格罗斯警告说，随着 "过度繁荣 "席卷金融市场，投资者将面临颠簸。【原文：Bill Gross warned that investors are in for a bumpy ride as “excessive exuberance” sweeps financial markets.】

item.title: 法德壳牌石油公司 KNDS 将在乌克兰成立分公司
item.description: 法国和德国同意联手通过制造商 KNDS 的一家新子公司在乌克兰生产弹药，因为面对俄罗斯的进攻，基辅的盟国正寻求加强军事援助。【原文：France and Germany agreed to join forces to produce ammunition in Ukraine through a new subsidiary of manufacturer KNDS, as Kyiv’s allies seek to step up military help in the face of Russian advances.】

item.title: 俄罗斯和中国在联合国否决美国关于加沙停火的决议
item.description: 俄罗斯和中国周五在联合国安理会否决了一项由美国支持的决议，该决议称世界机构 "决定必须立即和持续停火以保护加沙平民"。【原文：Russia and China vetoed a US-backed resolution Friday in the United Nations Security Council that would have said the world body “determines the imperative of an immediate and sustained cease-fire to protect civilians” in Gaza.】

item.title: 人民币贬值拖累印度卢比收盘创新低
item.description: 在中国放松对人民币的控制令市场感到震惊之后，印度卢比周五跌至历史最低收盘水平，追随新兴市场同类货币兑美元的跌势。【原文：The Indian rupee fell to a record low closing level Friday, tracking declines in emerging market peers against the dollar, after China jolted markets by loosening its grip on the yuan.】

item.title: 法国电力价格因需求下降而继续暴跌
item.description: 由于需求疲软和国家核电机组的强劲表现，法国电力价格继续下跌。【原文：French power prices extended their decline due to weak demand and robust performance from the nation’s nuclear fleet.】

item.title: 乌克兰无人机袭击后俄罗斯原油炼制量跌至 10 个月低点
item.description: 在乌克兰无人机连续袭击几个主要设施之后，俄罗斯的日均炼油率降至十个月来的最低水平。【原文：Russia’s average daily oil refining rate fell to the lowest weekly level in ten months after a flurry of Ukrainian drone attacks hit several major facilities.】

item.title: 谷物交易商斯库拉（Scoular）寻求交易，行业低迷提供低价机会
item.description: 美国谷物贸易商斯库拉公司（Scoular Co.【原文：US grains trader Scoular Co. is hunting for more acquisitions to accelerate its growth, seeing bargains in competitors facing a profit squeeze.】

item.title: 勒梅尔称法国无需增税即可实现赤字目标
item.description: 法国财政部长布鲁诺-勒梅尔（Bruno Le Maire）表示，政府将在不增税的情况下实现控制预算赤字的目标，尽管疲软的经济增长和令人失望的税收收入破坏了政府的初步计划。【原文：French Finance Minister Bruno Le Maire said the government will meet its objective of reining in the budget deficit without raising taxes, even as weak economic growth and disappointing tax revenues undermine its initial plans.】

item.title: 凯茜-伍德的 "方舟 "在首次交易中被红人咬了一口
item.description: 把 Cathie Wood 算作 Reddit Inc.【原文：Count Cathie Wood as a Reddit Inc. investor.】
